scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:css && webpack --mode production
scripts.scan:light: node scripts/serve.js & sleep 0.5 && node scripts/axe-scan.js http://localhost:5000/tests/scan-light.html docs/tests/axe-light.json && kill $(lsof -ti tcp:5000) || true
scripts.scan:dark: node scripts/serve.js & sleep 0.5 && node scripts/axe-scan.js http://localhost:5000/tests/scan-dark.html docs/tests/axe-dark.json && kill $(lsof -ti tcp:5000) || true
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx gh-pages -d docs
